USING ITEMS

To use a psionic item, it must be activated, although sometimes activation is accomplished simply by picking up an item or putting it on. Some items, once they are carried or worn, function constantly. In most cases, using an item requires a standard action that does not provoke 기회 공격. By contrast, power completion items (see below) are treated just like powers in 전투 and do provoke 기회 공격.

Activating a psionic item is a standard action unless the item 묘사 indicates otherwise. 구현 시간 of a power is the time required to activate the same power in an item, whether it의 a power stone, a dorje, or a psionic tattoo, unless the item 묘사 specifically states otherwise.

The four ways to activate 사이오닉 아이템 are described below.

Power Completion: This is the activation method for 파워스톤. A power stone holds a power that is mostly finished. All that의 left to do is 공연 the short, simple, finishing parts of the manifestation (the final mental coda, as it were). To use a power completion item safely, a character must be of high enough 레벨 in the appropriate class to manifest the power already. If he can’t already manifest the power, there의 a chance he’ll make a mistake (see Brainburn in the power stone 묘사). Activating a power completion item is a standard action and provokes 기회 공격 exactly as manifesting a power does.

Powers stored in power completion items are usually not augmented, because 구현자 레벨 of such an item is assumed to be the minimum necessary to manifest the stored power. However, an item의 묘사 may specify otherwise (some 파워스톤 have 구현자 레벨 higher than the minimum required to manifest the stored power, and are then assumed to be augmented as well).

Power 트리거: This is the activation method for 도르제 and 사이크라운. It requires the special 지식 of power manifestation that a character of the appropriate class would know, and the formation of the appropriate 명령 thought. If a power is on a character의 파워 목록, the character knows how to use a power 트리거 item that stores that power. The user must still determine what power is stored in the item before she can activate it. Activating a power 트리거 item is a standard action that does not provoke 기회 공격.

Powers stored in power 트리거 items are not augmented. Such powers are assumed to be stored in the item at the minimum 구현자 레벨 necessary to manifest the power. However, certain items may specify a higher 구현자 레벨 than necessary. If such an item holds a power that deals hit point 피해, the power is assumed to be augmented to the maximum allowed by the power and 구현자 레벨.

명령 Thought: If no activation method is suggested either in the psionic item 묘사 or by the nature of the item, assume that a 명령 thought is needed to activate it. 명령 thought activation means that a character mentally projects a thought, and the item activates. No other special 지식 is needed. Activating a 명령 thought psionic item is a standard action that does not provoke 기회 공격.

Sometimes 명령 thought to activate an item is mentally imprinted within it and is whispered into the mind of a creature who picks it up. Other items are silent, but a 지식(사이오닉) or 지식(history) check might be useful in helping to 식별 명령 thoughts. A successful DC 30 check is needed to come up with 명령 thought in this case. The power psionic 식별 reveals 명령 thoughts.

Powers stored in 명령 thought items are usually not augmented, because 구현자 레벨 of such an item is assumed to be the minimum possible to manifest the stored power.

Use-Activated: This type of psionic item simply has to be used to activate. Use activation is generally straightforward and self-explanatory.

Many use-activated items are objects that a character wears. Some items made for wearing must still be activated. Although this activation sometimes requires a 명령 thought (see above), usually it means mentally willing the activation to happen  (a free action). 묘사 of an item states whether a 명령 thought is needed in such a case.

Unless stated otherwise, activating a use-activated psionic item is either a standard action or not an action at all and does not provoke 기회 공격, unless the use involves performing an action that provokes 기회 공격 in itself. If the use of the item takes time before a psionic effect occurs, then use activation is a standard action. If the item의 activation is subsumed in its use and takes no extra time, use activation is not an action at all.

Use activation doesn’t mean that if you use an item, you automatically know what it can do. You must know (or at least guess) what the item can do and then use the item to activate it, unless the benefit of the item comes automatically.

Powers stored in use-activated items are usually not augmented, because 구현자 레벨 of such an item is assumed to be the minimum possible to manifest the stored power.

SAVING THROWS AGAINST PSIONIC ITEM POWERS

사이오닉 아이템 produce 사이오닉 파워. The DC of a 내성 굴림 against a power from a psionic item is always 10 + 레벨 of the power or effect + the 능력 수정치 of the minimum ability score needed to manifest that 레벨 of power.

Another way to figure the same number is to multiply the power의 레벨 by 1-1/2 and add 10 to the result.

Some 사이오닉 아이템 take advantage of the fact that powers can be augmented to increase their 내성 굴림 DCs. These items are special and have their cost to create and 시장 가격 calculated using the manifester의 레벨 instead of the power의 레벨.

DAMAGING PSIONIC ITEMS

The only exceptions to this rule are intelligent 사이오닉 아이템, which make Will 내성 굴림 based on their own 지혜 scores.

Some items are single-use and expendable. Such items can often be found in sets or groups.

In the following sections, each type of psionic item, such as 갑옷 or 사이오닉 문신, has a general 묘사, followed by 묘사 of specific items.

Some individual items, notably those that simply store 사이오닉 파워, don’t get full-blown 묘사. Simply reference the power의 묘사. Assume that the power is manifested at the minimum 레벨 required to manifest it, unless otherwise noted. The main reason to make 구현자 레벨 higher, or course, would be to increase the potency of the power. Raising 구현자 레벨 is common for powers such as 영적 구조물, 지속시간 of which increases with 레벨 of the manifester.

Items with full 묘사 have their 능력 detailed, and each of the following aspects of these items is summarized at the end of 묘사.

For 사이오닉 문신, 파워스톤, and 도르제, the creator can set 구현자 레벨 of an item at any number high enough to manifest the stored power and not higher than her own 구현자 레벨.
